subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: With N.H.L. training camp a month away, Ray Shero, Pittsburgh’s general manager, said Sidney Crosby was still feeling the effects of the head injury that sidelined him in January.
snippet: With N.H.L. training camp a month away, Ray Shero, Pittsburgh’s general manager, said Sidney Crosby was still feeling the effects of the head injury that sidelined him in January.
